inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
dart = nat : Set
B = fix B (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B m0 k x) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then m0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> fmap
B0_L1_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) one x' y' in inv_hmap m1 -> B m1 zero x = L m one x' y'
B0_L0_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) zero x' y' in inv_hmap m1 -> B m1 zero x = L m zero x' y'
inv_hmap_L0L1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) one x' y' in let m2 := L (L m one x' y') zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> inv_hmap m2
inv_hmap_L0L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) zero x' y' in let m2 := L (L m zero x' y') zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> inv_hmap m2
BinIntDef.Z.add = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0%Z => y | Z.pos x' => match y with | 0%Z => x | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' + y') | Z.neg y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub x' y' end | Z.neg x' => match y with | 0%Z => x | Z.pos y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub y' x' | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' + y') end end : Z -> Z -> Z Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
x_1_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> cA_1 m one x = cA_1 m1 one x
y_0_1_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> cF m y = cA_1 m1 one (top m1 zero x)
y_0_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> cA_1 m zero y = top m1 zero x
x0_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> cA m zero x = bottom m1 zero x
y_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> y = cA m1 zero x
degree_L1_merge_x : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> MF.degree m1 x = MF.degree m x + MF.degree m y0
degree_L1_merge_y0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> MF.degree m1 y0 = MF.degree m x + MF.degree m y0
BinIntDef.Z.mul = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos x' => match y with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' * y') end | Z.neg x' => match y with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos y' => Z.neg (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.pos (x' * y') end end : Z -> Z -> Z Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
degree_L1_merge_MAX : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> let MAX := MF.degree m x + MF.degree m y0 in MF.degree_aux m1 x MAX = MAX
expf_L1_x : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), let y0 := cA m zero y in let m1 := L m one x y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> expf m x z -> expf m1 x z
expf_L1_y0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), let y0 := cA m zero y in let m1 := L m one x y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> expf m y0 z -> expf m1 y0 z
degree_L1_merge_x_others : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> exd m z -> ~ expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> ~ expf m y0 z -> MF.degree m1 z = MF.degree m z
degree_L1_split_x_y_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (j : nat), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let dx := MF.degree m x in y_1 = Iter (cF m) j x -> inv_hmap m1 -> 1 <= j <= dx - 1 -> expf m x y0 -> MF.degree m1 x = j
degree_L1_split_x_y0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (j : nat), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let dx := MF.degree m x in y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> inv_hmap m1 -> j < dx - 1 -> expf m x y0 -> MF.degree m1 x = j + 1
degree_L1_split_y_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (j : nat), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let dx := MF.degree m x in y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> j < dx - 1 -> expf m x y0 -> inv_hmap m1 -> MF.degree m1 y_1 = dx - (j + 1)
degree_L1_merge_aux : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (n : nat), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let MAX := MF.degree m x + MF.degree m y0 in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> 1 <= MAX - n -> MF.degree_aux m1 x (MAX - n) = MF.degree m x + MF.degree m y0
expf_L1_II_CNA_aux : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let m2 := L m one x y in let t := Iter (cF m2) i z in inv_hmap m2 -> exd m z -> expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> expf (L m one x y) z t -> expf m z t
cF_L1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let x10 := cF_1 m x in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let m1 := L m one x y in cF m1 z = (if eq_dart_dec y0 z then x else if eq_dart_dec x10 z then y_1 else cF m z)
degree_L1_split_x_aux : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (j i : nat), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let dx := MF.degree m x in y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> i < j < dx - 1 -> expf m x y0 -> inv_hmap m1 -> MF.degree_aux m1 x (j - i) = j + 1
cF_L1_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let dx := MF.degree m x in ~ expf m x y0 -> Iter (cF m1) dx x = y_1
degree_L1_split_y_1_aux : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (j i : nat), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let dx := MF.degree m x in y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> j + 1 + i < dx -> expf m x y0 -> inv_hmap m1 -> MF.degree_aux m1 y_1 (dx - (j + 1 + i)) = dx - (j + 1)
degree_L1_merge_x_others_aux : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (n : nat), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let dz := MF.degree m z in inv_hmap m1 -> exd m z -> ~ expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> ~ expf m y0 z -> n < dz -> MF.degree_aux m1 z (dz - n) = MF.degree_aux m z (dz - n)
diff_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let dx := MF.degree m x in ~ expf m x y0 -> Iter (cF m1) dx x <> x
degree_L1_merge_summary : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), let y0 := cA m zero y in let m1 := L m one x y in inv_hmap m1 -> exd m z -> ~ expf m x y0 -> let dx := MF.degree m x in let dy0 := MF.degree m y0 in MF.degree m1 z = (if expf_dec m x z then dx + dy0 else if expf_dec m y0 z then dx + dy0 else MF.degree m z)
cF_L1_y0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let dy0 := MF.degree m y0 in ~ expf m x y0 -> Iter (cF m1) (dx + dy0) x = x
